revised_title: On the Longitudinal Strength of Cylinders Closed by Screw Plugs: A Theoretical Analysis
tldr: This article presents a theoretical analysis of the longitudinal strength of cylinders closed by screw plugs, considering factors such as internal pressure, screw thread geometry, and material properties. The author derives equations to calculate the maximum stress on the threaded part of the cylinder and provides guidelines for optimizing the design of such structures.
